{"id":1148373316,"question_id":15,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1705458925,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"539 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1148373316/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"51.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public List<List<Integer>> threeSum(int[] nums) {\n        Set<List<Integer>> res =new HashSet<>();\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len ;i++){\n            \n            int st=i+1, ed=len-1;\n            \n            while(st<ed){\n                \n                int sum = nums[i]+ nums[st]+nums[ed];\n                if(sum==0){\n                    res.add(Arrays.asList(new Integer[]{nums[i], nums[st], nums[ed]}));\n                    st++;\n                    ed--;\n                    \n                }else if(sum>0)\n                    ed--;\n                else\n                    st++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return new ArrayList<>(res);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
